```{r}

library(highcharter)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)


pokemon%>%
  count(type_1)%>%
  arrange(n)%>%
  hchart(type = "bar", hcaes(x = type_1, y = n))%>%  
  hc_exporting(
    enabled = TRUE, # always enabled
    filename = "custom-file-name" )
```
